# 大数据视觉工具包

方便进行大数据处理、呈现的工具类封装包

https://pypi.org/project/big-data-visual/

安装：

```
pip installl big-data-visual
```

## bdvisual.plot.rador

def draw(title,propname, propvalue1, propvalue2, outfilename, propvalueShow = 0, gridShow = 0, gridLabelShow = 0)


## bdvisual.plot.outdir

def get_output_dir()
